title: With All My Heart...
description: 1st in the "Lean On Him" Series When Amanda moves to a small town to pursue her career as a Children's Minister, she never expects to find the man God has sent for her. But just as she opens her heart up to him something terrible happens to her causing her to shut the world out, including the love of her life. Will he be able to help her find her faith, or will she be forever lost?
author: Stephanie Payne Hurt
